column1: The Pit Room////How I wish there were more barbeque places like this in south Florida
column2: where I'm from. But all the cuts of meat here were so moist and tender! They were all so great! We tried the ginormous beef rib
column4: and the pulled pork. All so unbelievably tender. The sides were good too. Had the okra
column7: and potato salad. But the star of the show were definitely the meats. A must try!
